name: Argo
headline: A social streaming platform powered by creators and fans
description: A platform for brands and creator to monetize their video entertainment more efficiently, build an engaged community and reward their fans.
tags: industry:crypto-web3; industry:consumer; industry:entertainment; industry:social; industry:infrastructure; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Arcadiy Golubovich, Founder
founders.description:
Graduate Moscow Economics School International Baccalaureate 2005. 
Graduate BA University of Arts London Central St Martins 2008. 
Living in LA, working in film production and VC media tech. 
Deeply passionate about story telling, technology and psychology. 
Started Argo in 2021 with a mission to empower independent filmmakers to tell stories that would otherwise never be told.

generated_description:
**Argo: A New Wave in Social Streaming**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the vibrant city of Los Angeles, Argo is carving a niche as a social streaming platform designed to be both creator- and fan-centric. Emerging from Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, Argo aims to transform how creators monetize their video entertainment while fostering a thriving community.

### Mission
The core mission of Argo is straightforward yet powerful: to empower creators and fans in a unique social streaming experience. The platform is built with a dual focus—helping creators efficiently monetize their content while also boosting fan engagement and rewarding those who support their favorite creators.

### The Team and Infrastructure
With a nimble team of 10 employees, Argo combines insight and innovation, supported by their group partner, Nan. The platform sits at the intersection of several hot tech sectors, placing strong emphasis on **crypto-web3**, **consumer engagement**, **entertainment**, and **social infrastructure**.

### Features and Offerings
On Argo, users can connect with friends, explore a roster of popular short films like "Fauve" and "Skin", and dive into a content creator's profile. The platform not only allows fans to enjoy content but also enables them to earn coins for sharing what they love. This rewarding mechanism engages users further, making them a part of the creative process. 

Argo is also accessible via various devices, with apps available for both Apple and Android. You can easily navigate to [Argo's website](https://Argo.LA) where users can sign up, explore their favorite films, and keep up with the latest blog posts.

### Tagline
“Artists Going Places Powered by Creators and Fans” encapsulates Argo’s ethos. It’s a space where creativity meets social interaction, positioning it as an exciting player in the entertainment landscape.

### Conclusion
In a world where the streaming space is increasingly crowded, Argo distinguishes itself by centering the fan-creator relationship. As they continue to grow, they’ll likely redefine how creators build their communities and interact with their supporters. If you’re curious about a fresh take on streaming, check out [Argo](https://Argo.LA) and see what the buzz is about.
